Name: Boratium Wars
About the game: Boratium Wars is a fast paced arcade style space shooter. Your mission: Collect Boratium resources from moving asteroids while avoiding dangerous obstacles, enemy competitors, and environmental hazards. What drives you: Wealth, Power, and a desire to be viewed as the very best! Use earnings from successful missions to upgrade your ships, or acquire new ships with an array of customizing to master both the art of survival and Boratium mining. Successful progression through the outer debris ring of the galaxy, increases both your rewards and difficulty. Advanced weaponry and tooling technologies allow the practiced to survive ruthless onslaughts of asteroids as well as both deadly human and aliens threats. Feel the pressure as countless waves of high speed volatile threats, as you develop your strategy to not only survive, but flourish in the cold dark of space. Play with keyboard and mouse, or use a Steam or Xbox compatible controllers. Fully supports controller play, for those who prefer a controller. Score Steam achievements and Boratium Tokens used to increase your fleet of ships. Get ranked on the global leader boards in both Galactic Top Pilot overall, and individual Top Pilot ranks by each ship class. Tons of fun for all ages!
